document.full_text: giving your baby cow's milk, nuts or other solid foods linked to allergies before six months does not appear to cause extra wheezing or eczema later on, according to a dutch study.
document.title: no need to hold back on milk, nuts in babies
lines_and_colors: giving your baby cow's milk, nuts or other solid foods linked to allergies before six months does not appear to cause extra wheezing or eczema later on, according to a dutch study.
